summary: A test suite that validates the Flax implementation of the GPT-2 language model, checking generation capabilities, handling of boolean attention masks, consistency with the PyTorch version, loading from pretrained checkpoints, and the correct operation of caching during forward passes.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, crossâ€‘framework compatibility, and performance of the Flax GPT-2 model for production use and downstream NLP applications.
